title: Mathilda Saxow has used a font in her portfolio...help!
content:
Hi!

I love this font - but I cant find it! Even tried sending Mathilda herself a mail and asking her, but I havent gotten an answer.. So if you have an idea please tell me ;o)

Thank you so much!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bilde 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317140234/http:/typophile.com/files/Bilde%201_0.png) | 9.51 KB |
| [Bilde 4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317140234/http:/typophile.com/files/Bilde%204_1.png) | 7.15 KB |
| [Bilde 5.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317140234/http:/typophile.com/files/Bilde%205.png) | 11.24 KB |
author: marenhei

comments.content: If no one finds it - [DIN16](http://web.archive.org/web/20130317140234/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=din16) is pretty close...

WOW! Thank you once again!  
You really know typefaces Florian!
